items.name: Upvibe Synthetic Lace Up Men's Sports Shoes

productDetails.aboutBrand: Adidas is a globally renowned sports and lifestyle brand, designing and manufacturing footwear, apparel, and accessories.
productDetails.description: It is a lifestyle tooling which leaves a classic impression of the wearer. Its raised wall protects the feet while walking & its anti-skid resistance provides a better grip to the ground & helps you to walk firmly
productDetails.manufacturerDetails: Adidas India Marketing Private Ltd. Office no.6, 2nd Floor, Sector-B, Pocket-7, Plot no-11, Vasant Kunj, New Delhi-110070
